WRITING.TITLE: I got my ultimate dream and i hate it
WRITING.TEXT:
my dream my whole life was to move to vancouver BC. this past summer i got to move to bc ( not vancouver because my mother refuses to let me I'm 20) i moved to a small town ( HATE small towns)
but i thought at least moving to BC would make me happy.
im in hell i hate being out here .
Health care is way worst .
the people are shitty.
disability is terrible .
theres not a family doctor for 4 hours ( cant keep doctors around here).
you have to drive 2 hours just to get to a hospital or a supermarket.
i though moving out here would make me so happy its all i ever wanted. Now i regret it like you wouldn't believe and no i cant go back to ontario because my whole family located her there all happy out here and I'm miserable.
PS i cant move to vancouver with out my moms say even though I'm 20. because i don't drive and I'm in a wheelchair i will basically go where ever she will let me. she already said that if i move there she will not come see me and she won't take me there.
my partner and i rent a room from my mother ( trying to move trust me) and its just a room for 600 a month

i do agree i really love the sub but even my partner who loves fat logic who does have diabetes( since she was 10) its kind of offend by it
and i find it kind of obvious that i am looking at this particular site
i hate the green text like i mean the colour its hard for me to read

I am actully in a wheelchair ( cant walk at ALL ) since i was 10 years old i have Muscular disability
and do you have any idea how hard it is to get one of those spots it has nothing to do with the distance but you cant get the ramp out in small spots so you know what they can kiss my ass and walk farther because if i cant get one of those spots i cant go to the store e.g. if i need to go to the supermarket and cant park i need to go to another supermarket or come back later
